languages.text: "Значит, и ты, отче, стал жертвой их коварных уловок. Не ты ли проповедовал, что милосердие — лоно попустительства скверне? Что же... Как ты и говорил, грешны все. В том числе и ты".

"Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."
languages.original_text: "Значит, и ты, отче, стал жертвой их коварных уловок. Не ты ли проповедовал, что милосердие — лоно попустительства скверне? Что же... Как ты и говорил, грешны все. В том числе и ты".

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Father. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, everyone is a sinner. Including you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Father. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, everyone is a sinner. Including you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Father. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, everyone is a transgressor. Including you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Father. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, everyone is a transgressor. Including you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “既然如此，那他们的欺骗与诡计也同样影响了你，牧师。不正是你教导我，说仁慈会滋生堕落与腐化吗？好吧……正如你常说的那样，每个人都有罪，你也不例外。”
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，那他们的欺骗与诡计也同样影响了你，神父。不正是你教导我，说仁慈会滋生堕落与腐化吗？好吧……正如你常说的那样，每个人都有罪，你也不例外。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「司祭よ、ならばお前も、この欺瞞と策略の犠牲になっていたのだ。慈悲は堕落を招くと説いたのは、お前ではないか？まぁ…よく口にしていたとおり、純潔を守る者でさえ汚されている。皆、罪人なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: 「司祭よ、ならばお前も、この欺瞞と策略の犠牲になっていたのだ。慈悲は堕落を招くと説いたのは、お前ではないか？まぁ…よく口にしていたとおり、純潔を守る者でさえ汚されている。皆、罪人なのだ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Entonces usted también ha caído presa de sus engaños y artimañas, reverendo. ¿No fue usted quien predicó que la misericordia engendra confabulación con la corrupción? Pues... Como solía decir, nadie puede ser totalmente inocente, usted tampoco».
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces usted también ha caído presa de sus engaños y artimañas, padre. ¿No fue usted quien predicó que la misericordia engendra confabulación con la corrupción? Pues... Como solía decir, todo el mundo es un transgresor, incluso usted».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Dann seid auch Ihr ihrer Täuschung und List zum Opfer gefallen, Reverend. Habt nicht Ihr gepredigt, dass Gnade zu Duldung von Ketzerei führt? Nun ... Wie Ihr immer gesagt habt: Niemand ist rein. Auch Ihr nicht."
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: "Dann seid auch Ihr ihrer Täuschung und List zum Opfer gefallen, Vater. Habt nicht Ihr gepredigt, dass Gnade zu Duldung von Ketzerei führt? Nun ... Wie Ihr immer gesagt habt: Jeder ist ein Sünder. Auch Ihr."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Alors, vous avez vous aussi succombé à cette duperie, révérend. N'est-ce pas vous qui prêchiez que la clémence ne fait qu'encourager les gens à accepter la corruption ? Ma foi... comme vous le disiez vous-même, personne n'est parfait, vous y compris. »
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, vous avez vous aussi succombé à cette duperie, mon père. N'est-ce pas vous qui prêchiez que la clémence ne fait qu'encourager les gens à accepter la corruption ? Ma foi... comme vous le disiez vous-même, nous sommes tous des pécheurs, vous y compris. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Öyleyse sen de aldatmacalara ve hilelere kurban gitmişsin Muhterem. Merhametin, yozlaşmaya göz yummaya yol açacağının vaazlarını veren sen değil miydin? Ya... Eskiden de dediğin gibi kimse arı değildir. Buna sen de dâhilsin."
languages.original_text: "Then you, too, have fallen prey to their deceit and trickery, Reverend. Was it not you who preached that mercy breeds connivance at corruption? Well... As you used to say, none are unsullied. That includes you."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse sen de aldatmacalara ve hilelere kurban gitmişsin Muhterem. Merhametin, yozlaşmaya göz yummaya yol açacağının vaazlarını veren sen değil miydin? Eh, eskiden de dediğin gibi, kimse arı değildir. Buna sen de dâhilsin."
traits.speaker: Chorda
